I would love to have you on the stage at Front-End Conf '13.

We have talked about this a little bit already, but I wanted to try to answer any questions that you may immediately have.

What, Where and When is it?

This year will be two days again, focused on front-end design and dev held in St. Petersburg, Florida. It will be on June 21st and 22nd in 2013.

Day one is 7 presentations from the invited speakers, like yourself. Day two is a shorter day where attendees can sign up in advance to present.

We will be in the same theater as last year and will be rocking that same hotel where you came out for lunch for all of the speakers.

Why Me?

You know I'm a big fan. I've been social stalking you and the team since you were Ordered List. I dig that you're on the design/markup side of things and you're a down-ass dude.

One of the big factors was also that you were from the area. I love having the local tie-ins even though you were smart enough to get out of here and move on to awesome things.

What Do You Want From Me?

I would love to have you on stage to give a presentation, which has a 50 minute window for the talk and Q&A. The topic is up to you because I feel it is important for you to choose what you are eager to share.

I know that you'll be working on the actual presentation until minutes before you're on the stage, but I would love to have all of the topics by the end of December. I haven't been the best about getting topics out to the crowd in a timely fashion in the past, so I would really like to launch the site with them this year.

What about Compensation?

We provide travel, lodging and fun. Our goal is for it to not cost you money to come down and present, but we don't offer actual payment. We try to keep the attendee cost as low as possible for those people not lucky enough to have company conference budgets.

We will arrange travel and lodging or provide compensation for it if you'd like to arrange it. Typically, past speakers have flown in Thursday and out on Saturday or Sunday depending on if they wanted to attend day 2. We can work out something to balance that out for you since you are right over the bridge.

There is a speaker dinner the night before the event and we will arrange for lunch and dinner if you're around for those on the day of. (Many people end up out with groups.)

What's Next?

Once you've checked your calendar and given it some thought, please just shoot me an email or a DM to let me know if you'll be making my day! Then we can work out the details.

Thank you!
Dan
